Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Howdy \How"dy\, n. [Scot., also houdy- wife. Of uncertain origin; cf. OSw. jordgumma; or perh. fr. E. how d'ye.] A midwife. [Prov. Eng.] [1913 Webster]
howdy n : an expression of greeting; "every morning they exchanged polite hellos" [syn: {hello}, {hullo}, {hi}, {how-do-you-do}]
